text: Jenifer Brening (born 15 December 1996 in Berlin, Germany) is a German singer and songwriter who represented San Marino in the Eurovision Song Contest 2018 in Lisbon, Portugal, with the song "Who We Are", alongside Jessika. She previously participated in the talent show The Winner Is ... and in the eleventh season of the talent show Deutschland sucht den Superstar. ==Discography== ===Album=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text- align:center;" |- ! scope="col" style="width:12em;"| Title ! scope="col" style="width:18em;"| Details |- ! scope="row"| Recovery | * Released: 4 November 2016 * Label: Khb Music * Format: digital download, CD |} ===Extended plays=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col" style="width:12em;"| Title ! scope="col" style="width:18em;"| Details |- ! scope="row"| My Sky | * Released: 25 February 2013 * Label: Copyright Control * Format: Digital download |} ===Singles=== ====As lead artist==== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col" style="width:16em;"| Title ! scope="col" style="width:1em;"| Year ! scope="col"| Album |- ! scope="row"| "Not That Guy" | 2013 | rowspan="4" |- ! scope="row"| "A New Me" | rowspan="3"| 2014 |- ! scope="row"| "Alive" |- ! scope="row"| "Not That Guy" (Eike & Kaz Radio Edit) |- ! scope="row"| "ASAP" | 2015 | rowspan="4"| Recovery |- ! scope="row"| "Miracle" | rowspan="2"| 2016 |- ! scope="row"| "Remember" |- ! scope="row"| "Breathe" | 2017 |- ! scope="row"| "Until the Morning Light" | 2018 | |} ====As featured artist==== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! scope="col" style="width:16em;"| Title ! scope="col" style="width:1em;"| Year ! scope="col"| Album |- ! scope="row"| "So etwas darf nicht passieren" (White Night featuring Jenifer Berning) | 2011 | rowspan="2" |- ! scope="row"| "Who We Are" (Jessika featuring Jenifer Berning) | 2018 |} ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants of 2018 Category:Living people Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants for San Marino Category:Singers from Berlin Category:21st-century German singers
